thread.title: Justin Timberlake & Matt Bomer Are Handsome Studs at Variety Brunch
thread.title_full: Justin Timberlake & Matt Bomer Are Handsome Studs at Variety Brunch

author: Just Jared
title: Justin Timberlake & Matt Bomer Are Handsome Studs at Variety Brunch
text:
Justin Timberlake looks super cool in a gray suit as he arrives at the Variety’s Celebratory Brunch on Saturday afternoon (January 28) at Cecconi’s restaurant in West Hollywood, Calif.
The Oscar-nominated actor was joined at the event by Matt Bomer , Glen Powell , Aldis Hodge, and Jovan Adepo .
The brunch benefited the Motion Picture Television Fund and celebrated the work of this season’s biggest stars and nominees.
During the event, Variety donated $25,000 to the fund, which will go to help supporting the entertainment community in living and aging well.
